cause.description:
Garrett Matejcek recieved a phone bill of exactly $734.70. That is for only one months use. If this keeps up, and we do not give relief, over the course of a year his total bill will add up to $8,816.40. Please help.
1. The bill was enormously big.
2. Money is an object.
3. Money should not be spent on these silly things.
cause.mission: pay off Garrett's enormous phone bill.
cause.name: Garrett Matejcek Phone Bill Relief Fund
